name: Patryk Zaslawski

I am adept at creating responsive user interfaces utilizing **Figma**, **Sketch**, and design systems with **Storybook**. My proficiency in writing efficient **REST APIs** complements my frontend development expertise, ensuring seamless integration and enhanced user experience. Experienced with testing frameworks such as **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **Jest**, I ensure the reliability and quality of my code. Additionally, I have experience with **.NET**, **C#**, and cloud platforms like **Azure**, further strengthening my full stack capabilities. My background in Python frameworks (FastAPI, Django, Flask), database management (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB), and microservices architecture enriches my approach to delivering high-performance solutions within the e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors.
